name: Clover Studio
tagline: Developing products to skyrocket your business!
description:
Clover Studio is specialized for innovative mobile and web solutions in enterprise or startup products with over 10 years of industry experience. We operate as your technical partners, a virtual team who uses knowledge gained in over 70 projects to deliver the best possible apps for your business. 
Our services cover End-to-End service, from creative/production stage up to acceptance to an app store; or just development, design and QA services separately.
A four leaf clover is very hard to find and so are great partners and developers. We are your everlasting stroke of good luck, a team of enthusiastic developers who use their vast experience to create cutting edge software. Our skill sets are combined to help you achieve the full potential of your project.
